No trains between Suffern and Port Jervis
Buses run between Ramsey-Route 17 and all stations Sloatsburg through Port Jervis

No trains between Suffern and Port Jervis
Buses run between Ramsey-Route 17 and all stations Sloatsburg through Port Jervis

Trains will operate between Hoboken and Suffern, on modified schedules with express trains cancelled.
Riders traveling from Otisville and Salisbury Mills to Hoboken and New York should consider using the Middletown or Harriman stations instead, as only local bus service will be available which does not connect with the train at Ramsey-Route 17..

Busing begins with the 12:39 AM from Hoboken early Saturday morning and train service resumes with the 4:41 AM from Port Jervis on Sunday.

Download the bus schedule to plan your trip.

Trains will operate between Hoboken and Suffern, on modified schedules with express trains cancelled.
Riders traveling from Otisville and Salisbury Mills to Hoboken and New York should consider using the Middletown or Harriman stations instead, as only local bus service will be available which does not connect with the train at Ramsey-Route 17..

Busing begins with the 12:39 AM from Hoboken on Friday night (early Saturday morning) and train service resumes with the 12:39 AM from Hoboken on Sunday night (early Monday morning).

No trains between Suffern and Port Jervis
Buses run between Ramsey-Route 17 and all stations Sloatsburg through Port Jervis

Regular service will operate between Hoboken and Suffern. Outbound riders should board their regular trains at Hoboken/Secaucus Junction and detrain at Ramsey-Route 17 for bus service.

The following trains are affected:
Inbound: 9:21 AM, 11:35 AM, 1:35 PM from Port Jervis, and the 3:20 PM from Middletown
Outbound: 8:25 AM, 9:47 AM, 12:42 PM, and 2:41 PM from Hoboken
Download the bus schedule to plan your trip.

Regular service will operate between Hoboken and Suffern. Outbound riders should board their regular trains at Hoboken/Secaucus Junction and detrain at Ramsey-Route 17 for bus service.

The following trains are affected:

  • Inbound: 9:21 AM, 11:35 AM, 1:35 PM from Port Jervis, and the 3:20 PM from Middletown

  • Outbound: 8:25 AM, 9:47 AM, 12:42 PM, and 2:41 PM from Hoboken

Download the bus schedule to plan your trip.
Mon to Fri, 9:00 AM to 4:15 PM, Sep 12 - Nov 11
Buses replace trains between Southeast and Wassaic
Buses replace trains between Southeast and Wassaic

Regular service will operate between Grand Central and Southeast.
Express and local bus service will be available for most trains. Expect up to an hour of additional travel time. View the detailed bus schedule

We appreciate your patience while we conduct extensive track maintenance.

September 12 through November 20, 2022
You may need to move to a different car to exit at North White Plains station
You may need to move to a different car to exit at North White Plains station

The south section of the station platforms will be closed for repairs through Spring 2022, so only six cars will platform on some trains. Please listen for train crew instructions to determine if you can exit from your car.

Consider making transfers at White Plains station instead.
